Staffing Services

Aligning an individual goals and expertise and matching them to a company's role and culture is both art and science. Few firms possess the know-how and get it right. At Blackhill, we take pride we understand complexities of today's marketplace and leverage from best practices and real life experience.

By getting to know our clients and our candidates we gain a better inderstanding of what both are looking for. Our "do things right" motto is backed by our philosophy of creating log-term relationship with our clients. We understand our of client's most important asset is human capital.

We source a highly qualified and flexible worforce as required in a promptly manner. We cate to our clients needs by providing a wide range of recruiting options.

Temporary Staffing

We supply the needs of your organization whereas is short term assignments, to longer projects that require specific personnel.

Contracting Solutions

Outsourced subject matter experts on a contract.

Contract to Hire

We provide personnel on a contract to hire basis.
